value.name: Cleveland, Hixson Lock Up State Wrestling Titles
value.description: Cleveland finished the weekend with 10 medalists with Aaron Oliver (152) and John Gaither (285) fourth, Triston Blansit (113) and Koran Kennedy (220) fifth and William Haas sixth at 145.
